briefTitle: Amphetamine Extended-Release Tablets in the Treatment of Adults With ADHD
officialTitle: Amphetamine Extended-Release Tablets in the Treatment of Adults With ADHD

interventions.name: AMPH ER Tab Matching Placebo 5, 10, 15 and 20 mg
otherNames: Amphetamine Extended Release Tablets Matching Placebo

summary: To evaluate the efficacy of AMPH ER TAB compared to placebo in adult patients with ADHD aged 18 to 60 years.

primaryOutcome.measure: Lean Squares Mean (Â± Standard Error) of Math Test Score Over All Post-dose Time Points (0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 10, 12, 13, and 14 Hours Post-dose) Assessed During the Administration of Serial Math Tests at Visit 5 (Week 5)
